channel.title: Joel Edgerton on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Joel Edgerton on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Dinner With Pamela Anderson or Horseback Riding on the Beach? Discover the Hidden Pleasures of the Deauville American Film Festival
item.description: It’s Europe’s chicest film festival, but you probably know nothing about it. Here, THR runs through the highlights of the 51st edition, set amid lavish events and stunning Normandy sunsets.

item.title: Joel Edgerton, William H. Macy Confront a Rapidly Changing America in ‘Train Dreams’ Teaser Trailer
item.description: Felicity Jones and Kerry Condon also star in the period movie about a Pacific Northwest logger and rail worker set to hit Netflix on Nov. 21 after a short theatrical run.
